Package org.mbild.mbwatch.fx

Class FXMessage

java.lang.Object
org.mbild.mbwatch.fx.FXMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class FXMessage extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Basic controller class for message dialogs.
Author:
Matthias Bild
